comment.author: 38789304@N06
comment._content: Great views of historicals personages.  Thanks and greetings.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
In 1919, a Beatrice W. Woerz married Lester Andrew Hamilton, a mechanical engineer in New York City.  Her father was Frederick W. Woerz, a wealthy German-American brewer.  A Woerz-owned residence in Greenwich Village, elsewhere on Flickr:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/emilio_guerra/4507923708/]

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Looks like Dunbar B. Adams, son of John Dunbar Adams, married an Edith Temple Gracie in 1917-18.  Dunbar B. Adams graduated from Columbia University.  Edith died soon after they married, in December 1918.

comment.author: 8430189@N06
comment._content: I love their old bathing suits.

comment.author: 8295627@N08
comment._content: Oh my! I can see her wrists!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The estate of the wealthy John Dunbar Adams was on the south shore of Long Island; perhaps this photo of his son was taken at a public beach near there?
